panels.description: This panel illustrates the distribution of vulnerability severities across different clusters. It provides an overview of the count of vulnerabilities categorized by severity levels within each cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT cluster_name, vul_severity, count(*) 
FROM default.trivy_vul
GROUP BY cluster_name, vul_severity
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT cluster_name, vul_severity, count(*) 
FROM default.trivy_vul
GROUP BY cluster_name, vul_severity

panels.title: Vulnerability Severity counts grouped by Cluster

panels.description: This panel illustrates the distribution of misconfiguration severities across different clusters. It provides an overview of the count of misconfigurations categorized by severity levels within each cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT cluster_name, misconfig_severity, count(*)
FROM default.trivy_misconfig
GROUP BY cluster_name, misconfig_severity
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT cluster_name, misconfig_severity, count(*)
FROM default.trivy_misconfig
GROUP BY cluster_name, misconfig_severity

panels.title: Misconfiguration Severity counts grouped by Cluster

panels.description: This panel displays the total of misconfigurations from each clusters.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT cluster_name, count(*) FROM default.trivy_misconfig
GROUP BY cluster_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT cluster_name, count(*) FROM default.trivy_misconfig
GROUP BY cluster_name

panels.description: This panel displays the total number Vulnerabilities under each namespace

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:

GROUP BY cluster_name

panels.title: Vulnerability Count by Cluster

panels.description: This panel provides a count of high vulnerabilities categorized by namespace. It helps to monitor and prioritize high security issues across different namespaces.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT cluster_name, namespace, count(vul_severity) AS High_Severity
FROM default.trivy_vul
WHERE vul_severity = 'HIGH'
GROUP BY cluster_name, namespace
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT cluster_name, namespace, count(vul_severity) AS High_Severity
FROM default.trivy_vul
WHERE vul_severity = 'HIGH'
GROUP BY cluster_name, namespace

panels.description: This panel displays the count of Misconfigurations in different clusters and namespaces.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

SELECT cluster_name, namespace, count(*) AS Misconfigurations
FROM default.trivy_misconfig
GROUP BY cluster_name, namespace

SELECT cluster_name, namespace, count(*) AS Misconfigurations
FROM default.trivy_misconfig
GROUP BY cluster_name, namespace

panels.title: Misconfiguration Count by Cluster and Namespace

panels.description: This panel displays the count of vulnerabilities in different clusters and namespaces.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT cluster_name, namespace, count(*) AS Vulnerabilities
FROM default.trivy_vul
GROUP BY cluster_name, namespace
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT cluster_name, namespace, count(*) AS Vulnerabilities
FROM default.trivy_vul
GROUP BY cluster_name, namespace

panels.title: Vulnerability Count by Cluster and Namespace

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT "cluster_name", "namespace", "kind", "name", "vul_id", "vul_vendor_ids", "vul_pkg_id", "vul_pkg_name", "vul_pkg_path", "vul_installed_version", "vul_fixed_version", "vul_title", "vul_severity", "vul_published_date", "vul_last_modified_date" 
FROM "default"."trivy_vul"
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(vul_last_modified_date)
ORDER BY vul_last_modified_date DESC
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT "cluster_name", "namespace", "kind", "name", "vul_id", "vul_vendor_ids", "vul_pkg_id", "vul_pkg_name", "vul_pkg_path", "vul_installed_version", "vul_fixed_version", "vul_title", "vul_severity", "vul_published_date", "vul_last_modified_date" 
FROM "default"."trivy_vul"
WHERE vul_last_modified_date >= toDateTime(1694099993) AND vul_last_modified_date <= toDateTime(1694186393)
ORDER BY vul_last_modified_date DESC

panels.title: Trivy Vulnerabilities

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT "cluster_name", "namespace", "kind", "name", "misconfig_id", "misconfig_avdid", "misconfig_type", "misconfig_title", "misconfig_desc", "misconfig_msg", "misconfig_query", "misconfig_resolution", "misconfig_severity", "misconfig_status" 
FROM "default"."trivy_misconfig"
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT "cluster_name", "namespace", "kind", "name", "misconfig_id", "misconfig_avdid", "misconfig_type", "misconfig_title", "misconfig_desc", "misconfig_msg", "misconfig_query", "misconfig_resolution", "misconfig_severity", "misconfig_status" 
FROM "default"."trivy_misconfig"

panels.title: Trivy Misconfiguration

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT "cluster_name", "artifact_name", "vul_id", "vul_pkg_id", "vul_pkg_name", "vul_installed_version", "vul_fixed_version", "vul_title", "vul_severity", "vul_published_date", "vul_last_modified_date" 
FROM "default"."trivyimage"
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(vul_last_modified_date)
ORDER BY vul_last_modified_date DESC
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT "cluster_name", "artifact_name", "vul_id", "vul_pkg_id", "vul_pkg_name", "vul_installed_version", "vul_fixed_version", "vul_title", "vul_severity", "vul_published_date", "vul_last_modified_date" 
FROM "default"."trivyimage"
WHERE vul_last_modified_date >= toDateTime(1693581675) AND vul_last_modified_date <= toDateTime(1694186475)
ORDER BY vul_last_modified_date DESC

panels.title: Trivy Image

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT "schema", "bom_format", "spec_version", "serial_number", "version", "metadata_timestamp", "metatool_vendor", "metatool_name", "metatool_version", "component_bom_ref", "component_type", "component_name", "component_version", "component_property_name", "component_property_value", "component_hash_alg", "component_hash_content", "component_license_exp", "component_purl", "dependency_ref" 
FROM "default"."trivysbom"
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(metadata_timestamp)
ORDER BY metadata_timestamp DESC
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT "schema", "bom_format", "spec_version", "serial_number", "version", "metadata_timestamp", "metatool_vendor", "metatool_name", "metatool_version", "component_bom_ref", "component_type", "component_name", "component_version", "component_property_name", "component_property_value", "component_hash_alg", "component_hash_content", "component_license_exp", "component_purl", "dependency_ref" 
FROM "default"."trivysbom"
WHERE metadata_timestamp >= toDateTime(1693581733) AND metadata_timestamp <= toDateTime(1694186533)
ORDER BY metadata_timestamp DESC

panels.title: Trivy_SBOM
